name: BirdCamp
description:
Bird Camp is an educational first-person bird watching game for PC/Mac, set amidst a forest park view, where the player is a bird watcher who has joined the bird camp. The player can walk throughout the forest and use their set of binoculars to watch different birds and learn about them.

Gameplay
  • The player is given a set of binoculars. 
  • The scene includes clear bird locations and instructions for the player to follow and view birds closely. 
  • The player earn gems each time they discover a new bird and learn about them.
  • The game ends when the player has learned about all the birds in the game. 
Controls
  • Move with 'WASD' or Arrow keys.
  • Activate/de-activate binoculars with SpaceBar.
  • Zoom in on birds with Left Click and Zoom out with Right Click.

This is a student project for INFSCI2955 at the University of Pittsburgh.
